SEARCH
Package org.group7.model.entities.piece

Class GoalStretchState

java.lang.Object
org.group7.model.entities.piece.GoalStretchState
All Implemented Interfaces:
PieceState
public class GoalStretchState extends Object implements PieceState
The GoalState class represents the state of a piece when it has reached the goal stretch. It implements the PieceState interface.

    handleCollision(Piece p, IMoveHandler handler)

    • handleCollision

      public void handleCollision(Piece p, IMoveHandler handler)
      The handleCollision function calls the addPiece method of the handler object, passing in the piece's position + 1 modulo the number of outer tiles.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      p - The parameter "p" is of type "Piece". It represents the piece that the collision has occured with.
